text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. Even though the calendar says it is February, it has felt more like June this past week. The warm weather has made me realize just how much I love the spring. After freezing with no heat on the first floor of the house for most of January it feels so nice to have the windows and doors open. :-). I know it won’t last, but I am going to enjoy it while it does. I hope no matter what the weather is where you live it is allowing you to have a nice weekend. Today my sister and family are coming over to watch the Superbowl. We are all from the Philadelphia area so you know who we will be rooting for. Posts You May Have Missed This Week: Reveal of My Kitchen After Adding Finishing Touches. (open in same tab) Something to Think About I didn’t need to read the research to know that libraries are good for our well-being. (open in same tab) “Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes… including you.” – Anne Lamott If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

Even though the calendar says it is February, it has felt more like June this past week. The warm weather has made me realize just how much I love the spring. After freezing with no heat on the first floor of the house for most of January it feels so nice to have the windows and doors open. :-). I know it won’t last, but I am going to enjoy it while it does.

I hope no matter what the weather is where you live it is allowing you to have a nice weekend. Today my sister and family are coming over to watch the Superbowl. We are all from the Philadelphia area so you know who we will be rooting for.

Posts You May Have Missed This Week:

  • Reveal of My Kitchen After Adding Finishing Touches. (open in same tab)

Something to Think About

I didn’t need to read the research to know that libraries are good for our well-being. (open in same tab)


“Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes… including you.” – Anne Lamott

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.
